item.title: Sharpcast: Client Side C++ Guru for Synchronization Engine (san mateo)
item.description:
Company: Sharpcast, Inc.

Location: San Mateo, CA

Job Title: Software Engineer, Synchronization Engine  Platform Technologies

Description:

In this role you will be responsible for designing and implementing key elements of the cross-platform, client-server synchronization architecture that is the backbone of the SugarSync service. Sharpcast has created a unique, general-purpose synchronization platform that enables unparalleled reach for users data. The service provides rich access, backup, and sharing features for any data type (documents, photos, music, video, etc.) across a variety of device platforms (desktop, web, and mobile devices, including iPhone). Try it for yourself at http://www.sugarsync.com.

Requirements :

  • 3+ years of development experience
  • Strong C/C++ and OOD skills
  • Strong experience developing multi-threaded applications
  • Experience developing network applications using TCP/IP
  • BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
Desired Skills
  • Server-side Java experience
  • In-depth knowledge of the Win32 SDK
  • Mac OS X development background
  • Linux development background
Apply Now

About Sharpcast: Sharpcast is a very well-funded, 35-person startup in Palo Alto backed by Draper Fisher Jurvetson, Selby Ventures and Sigma Partners. We have launched a universal push synchronization platform, SugarSync, which enables any application to work as a service seamlessly across desktops PCs, web and mobile devices. Our patent-pending technology delivers a compelling user experience that combines the speed and flexibility of native client software with the advantages of web-based applications, making it irrelevant what device you are on and whether you are online or offline. The Sharpcast management team has a proven track record of starting successful software companies and building large online businesses.

If you're looking for a place where you can make a significant contribution to an exciting new product, Sharpcast could be the right place for you. Our compensation package is competitive and includes health benefits, stock options, and a 401(K) plan.

Sharpcast, Inc. does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies. Sharpcast, Inc. will not be responsible for any fee claims related to unsolicited resumes. Do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Sharpcast, Inc.s employees or to any company location.
